General.Name: Beijing Oriental Jicheng Co Ltd
General.Description: Beijing Oriental Jicheng Co., Ltd. offers products and solutions for test and measurement applications in China. It provides services, including instrument value-added sales, system integration, technology leasing, and related technical services. The company serves customers in various sectors, such as new energy vehicle test, semiconductor test, 5G communications, industrial internet of things, power and consumer electronics, radio frequency and microwave, electromagnetic compatibility, photovoltaic and energy storage, medical electronics, material and electrical analysis, testing and certification services, and other applications. Beijing Oriental Jicheng Co., Ltd. was founded in 2000 and is headquartered in Beijing, China.
